document.full_text: libyan rebels on saturday rejected muammar gaddafi's offer for a ceasefire and negotiations if nato stopped its attacks, saying the time for compromise had passed.
document.title: libyan rebels reject gaddafi ceasefire offer
lines_and_colors: libyan rebels on saturday rejected muammar gaddafi's offer for a ceasefire and negotiations if nato stopped its attacks, saying the time for compromise had passed.
